Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.19740994]human cytomegalovirus(HCMV):inhibition of virus replication in HeLa cells(70% inhibition).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Binding Target: pUL84(nonconventional nuclear localization signal of the essential viral replication factor)
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: The peptide specifically bind to UL84 protein and  utilized to inhibit HCMV replication.

Literature.Title: Inhibition of human cytomegalovirus replication via peptide aptamers directed against the nonconventional nuclear localization signal of the essential viral replication factor pUL84.
Literature.Author: Kaiser N, Lischka P, Wagenknecht N, Stamminger T.
